entry.summary: 吴说获悉，5月4日周四，标普全球公布的数据显示，中国4月财新制造业PMI为49.5，时隔两个月再度收缩，从3月份的荣枯分界点回落0.5个百分点。新订单量4月重现收缩，需求疲软导致用工量进一步下滑，就业指数降至三个月来最低。https://wallstreetcn.com/articles/3687928

entry.summary: TheBlock 揭秘来自俄罗斯的“空投猎人”：Auri 说他们已经尝试在 10 到 20 个具有潜在空投的项目中进行埋伏，专注于较大的潜在项目。他们将 Scroll、zkSync、Fuel 和 StarkNet 标为目标项目。他们手动完成所有交易，通过中心化交易所无需关联钱包即可将资金分配到各个钱包，并与其他空投猎人讨论最佳策略

entry.summary: 根据研究公司 Apptopia 的数据，尽管自去年 12 月加密货币价格触底以来已大幅反弹，但 Coinbase 应用程序的下载量仍在持续下降。此外，Coinbase 将于今日收盘后发布第一季度财报，投资者将关注交易量趋势以及 Coinbase 来自 USDC 的收入等信息。（Fortune） https://fortune.com/crypto/2023/05/03/coinbase-app-downloads-decline-ahead-of-key-earnings-report/ https://t.co/d0INhf62hn

entry.title: Genesis 在 FTX 破产前已经被主动还清了约 80 亿美金贷款；在破产的 90 天，Alameda 向 Genesis 偿还了 18 亿美金贷款，提供了 2.73 亿美金贷款；Genesis 从 FTX...
entry.summary: Genesis 在 FTX 破产前已经被主动还清了约 80 亿美金贷款；在破产的 90 天，Alameda 向 Genesis 偿还了 18 亿美金贷款，提供了 2.73 亿美金贷款；Genesis 从 FTX 撤出了 18.2 亿美金；债权人要求按照破产法，这近 40 亿美金的资金需要收回并与其他债权人共享分配。（CoinDesk）https://www.coindesk.com/policy/2023/05/03/ftx-seeks-to-claw-back-nearly-4b-in-ongoing-bankruptcy-case/?utm_source=twitter&utm_term=organic&utm_content=editorial&utm_campaign=coindesk_main&utm_medium=social

entry.title: 英国立法者周三投票赞成一项修正案，以放宽对加密公司的广告审批，将允许已在该国反洗钱监管机构注册的加密货币公司发布自己的广告。财政部表示，该修正案应在大...
entry.summary: 英国立法者周三投票赞成一项修正案，以放宽对加密公司的广告审批，将允许已在该国反洗钱监管机构注册的加密货币公司发布自己的广告。财政部表示，该修正案应在大约四个月后生效，以便加密公司有时间进行调整。（CoinDesk） https://www.coindesk.com/policy/2023/05/03/registered-uk-crypto-firms-can-approve-their-own-ads-lawmakers-decide/?utm_medium=referral&utm_source=rss&utm_campaign=headlines

entry.title: SEC 已在最终版本的对冲基金规则中删除了对“数字资产”的第一个正式定义。该机构在脚注中解释了原因： 委员会和工作人员正在继续考虑这个术语，目前不会将数字...
entry.summary: SEC 已在最终版本的对冲基金规则中删除了对“数字资产”的第一个正式定义。该机构在脚注中解释了原因： 委员会和工作人员正在继续考虑这个术语，目前不会将数字资产作为该规则的一部分。有观点认为“对数字资产作为新产品的独特性的任何承认都会削弱 SEC 在诉讼立场上的地位。”（CoinDesk）… https://twitter.com/i/web/status/1653925072074330112

entry.summary: 据路透社，OpenSea 前产品经理 Nathaniel Chastain 被判犯有欺诈和洗钱罪，他利用内部信息，了解哪些资产将在 OpenSea 首页上展示，从而提前进行 NFT 交易，非法获利超过 50,000 美元，曼哈顿的联邦检察官称这是第一起涉及数字资产的内幕交易案。 https://www.reuters.com/legal/ex-opensea-manager-convicted-nft-insider-trading-case-2023-05-03/

entry.title: Re Now that you have their wallet, you can set up alerts on their address, and buy things before they shill it, and sell when they sell. But going one...
entry.summary: Re Now that you have their wallet, you can set up alerts on their address, and buy things before they shill it, and sell when they sell. But going one step further, you can drop their address into Arkham or Breadcrumbs to find their other wallets as well

entry.title: Re Also, a faster way vs. etherscan downloads would be to use a query like the below from @defi_mochi, fork it, increase the amount of trades you want...
entry.summary: Re Also, a faster way vs. etherscan downloads would be to use a query like the below from @defi_mochi, fork it, increase the amount of trades you want displayed, filter for the time period you want and then download into excel + keep sorting uniques. https://dune.com/queries/1910245/3145737

entry.title: Re If an influencer gives you any additional context (debank balances, how much they made on a trade, etc), this should also be used to narrow down yo...
entry.summary: Re If an influencer gives you any additional context (debank balances, how much they made on a trade, etc), this should also be used to narrow down your search.

entry.title: Re Use a function like sort for "unique records only" and then you should be getting close, especially if you have a lot of token calls included. Then...
entry.summary: Re Use a function like sort for "unique records only" and then you should be getting close, especially if you have a lot of token calls included. Then comb through each wallet until you think you've found the influencer wallet.

entry.title: Re And then build a list of wallet addresses that bought or sold the token during this period. Repeat the process for basically every token that has b...
entry.summary: Re And then build a list of wallet addresses that bought or sold the token during this period. Repeat the process for basically every token that has been "called" and drop all the wallets into excel.

entry.title: Re Sometimes the above is enough to find a wallet that seems to be a match. But if the influencer sold their holdings quickly, it won't be that easy. ...
entry.summary: Re Sometimes the above is enough to find a wallet that seems to be a match. But if the influencer sold their holdings quickly, it won't be that easy. Instead, you need to download the etherscan history (or whatever block explorer) for 2-3 days before + 2-5 after the call

entry.title: Re You can run the Dune dashboard for all "recent" calls where you believe the influencer still holds the token. Then drop all the big cross-holders i...
entry.summary: Re You can run the Dune dashboard for all "recent" calls where you believe the influencer still holds the token. Then drop all the big cross-holders into excel, and start sorting through their activity on debank, etc

entry.title: Re Simply type in the 2 most recent tokens, filter by large balances (across both). From there, you can start digging through wallets. You are trying ...
entry.summary: Re Simply type in the 2 most recent tokens, filter by large balances (across both). From there, you can start digging through wallets. You are trying to match "call" activity vs. swap activity, so if the wallet you found does not touch the tokens discussed by influencer 🛑

entry.title: Re Step #1 -> once you find the influencer you want to identify onchain, look through their TG and Twitter posts. If they have 2 or more very recent c...
entry.summary: Re Step #1 -> once you find the influencer you want to identify onchain, look through their TG and Twitter posts. If they have 2 or more very recent calls, you can use this Dune dashboard as a starting point. https://dune.com/unexployed/Token-Overlap
